page.title: 14Fashion in School
page.content: have been replaced by neat small collars with matching thin ties often teamed with tiepins and broches often appearing without the tie! Bathing and Dolman sleeves seem to dominate the fairly baggy look of late in jumpers. The Pastel shades of summer have developed into strong shades such as magenta and mint green! Jewlerry has gone from gold or silver chains to thick bright plastic now, progressing to mock pearls and diamonte. Patterned tights are 'IN' -the more elaborate the better. In the mens scene,smart talor-look trousers with pleats at the yoke and the tapered leg have sprung up.Smart classey shoes are popular too.Hair is making a comeback-the cropped look is 'OUT'.Making way for more feminine looks such as the bob.The well groomed look is in for both sexes, perms are
